ExpSyntax.val: '... finished 170 Create document for the client'

Text.val: -- Switch to client language (Text in BAD013 has to be stored in client language
-- Store a new BATCH and one BATCH_PAYMENT row (only once)
... and set variables to trigger the call of GB101 in G.S. after the storage of
one INVO row (GB101 also obtain INVO)
